The claim that the: 1.9 trillion COVID-19 relief bill awards a $25 million bonus to House members is false and has been debunked by fact-checkers.
The bill itself: known as H.R.1319, does not contain any provisions that would provide a bonus to members of the House or Senate.
Previous similar claims: such as one made about a $2 trillion relief package signed by President Trump in 2020, were also proven to be false.
Multiple reputable sources: including Associated Press and Check Your Fact, have confirmed that the claim is baseless and misleading.
